reviews.review:
great game fun multiplayer coop 
and great story 9.5/10

이전 포탈에서 이어지며 탄탄한 스토리, 머리쓰게 만드는 여러 퍼즐방,
그리고 명품 반전...

很喜欢这代的场景，如果说一代是玩法让人眼前一亮，这代则是在剧情和环境渲染上令人惊艳。末日废墟的场景+科幻的设定  光是开头第一章就深深吸引了我。
解谜比上一代稍微难一些因为加入了很多其他的元素，但想一想试试也总能过关，比较亲民。 
流程比上一代长，一代通关2到3小时，二代单人剧情8小时+     
可玩性比上一代大大提升，有双人而且支持创意工坊 点赞

还有炮台真的好！萌！啊！ （不知不觉觉醒了什么奇怪的属性）   玩这代的时候每次遇到炮台完全不忍心弄坏都是放到别处背对我 时不时冒出一句"are you still there？"  “hello？”   (/ω＼)        啊  现在已经严重到有些要过关就必须破坏掉一些炮台每次都会有负罪感这样子。  感觉没救了（望天

Played Portal 2 as soon as I finished the first sequel. Everything in Portal 2 is more of Portal 1. More quirky humour, more playtime, deeper and more engaging story, better graphics, wider variety of puzzles, etc. All these things make Portal 2 a very worthy successor and one of the games you have to try. Personally, I liked the more simplistic Portal 1, but I had a great time playing them both.
have enjoyed many hours playing this, even after finishing it and erasing the saves and re-starting multiple times, i still enjoy it.

Élvezetes történettel rendelkező logikai játék. A végigjátszás után még mindig vár ránk élmény egy cooperatív játékban, és a workshop által nyújtott megannyi izgalomban. Sok év után is szórakoztató, akár nosztalgikus is lehet. Mindenkinek ajánlom, kortól és nemtől függetlenül.
早就听说portal2是个神作，正好夏季优惠，这么便宜不买白不买，本来只是尝试一下，结果根本停不下来！我只后悔为什么没有早点儿认识它！的确是个神作！
понравилось
класс super
one of the best puzzle games ever created, I loved Wheat Thins, (Wheatley) he added great friction within the storyline.

포탈2.

밸브사에서 나온 갓게임입니다.

포탈2는 이전작인 포탈1의 쉘을 소재로 게임이 이루어지며
많은 세월이 지난 애피처 사이언스에서 퍼즐을 풀고 빠져나가는 게임입니다.
포탈은 1이건 2건 정말 좋은 게임이라고 생각합니다.
하지만 게임성이 아무리좋다고해도 가격이 약간 부담스럽습니다.
뭐,그런거는 저처럼 세일할때 사시면 되니까요.

포탈2는 협동모드도 지원하기때문에 친구랑 자신 총 2명이서 하기에 충분한게임입니다.

다시한번 말하지만

İndirimlerde aldım haliyle. Oyuna ön yargılı başladım. Çünkü bu tarz bulmaca türü oyunlarda çabucak sinirlenebiliyorum. Ama bu oyunun bulmacalarını çözmek o kadar zevkliki. Daha sadece bir saat oynamama rağmen oyun beni resmen içine aldı. Hem zevk alı hem de beyninizi yakmak istiyorsanız buyrun :)  (Bu arada kesinlikle 31Tl veremem max 18TL bu oyun)
It's always nice when you have to use your brain for strategies. Nice Job!

I think is the reason that Valve doesnt release part 3s of their games. This one proved that you just cant top perfection. One of the best games I have ever played. From its great dialogue, to its whimsical character, this is one fantastic experience! The puzzles are just challenging enough to make you think, but solvable without to much struggle. The story keeps going at great pacing, and the storytelling is unforgettable! Seriously recommend!

Если вас прельщают игры, в которых нет моря крови, интересный сюжет, и где важен ум, а не сила, то вам эта игра придется по вкусу. Глава за главой проходится легко, если напрячь извилины, а сюжетная составляющая добавляет очков. С концовки я даже рыдала. Но особенно доставляют шуточки GLaDOS ^^

Portal was awesome before second part came out. I thought it can't get better and I was wrong. Oh I was so wrong. This game is something unforgetable, something adorable, something different.

Obra de arte

Probablemente el mejor juego de puzzles en primera persona. El concepto y la historia que se probaron en el primer juego fueron expandidos de manera perfecta. Es un juego que sigue incorporando mecánicas a lo largo de todo el juego acompañado por personajes con una personalidad muy definida y real.

Kesinlikle değişik ve zaman zaman beyin yakabilen bir puzzle oyunu. Singleplayer ve Multiplayer hikayelerini bitirdim bazen sıkılabilirsiniz her iki hikayede yaklaşık 5-6 saat sürüyor. Hikayeleri güzel, oynanış ve fizik motoru da güzel. Oynayın derim.

An ironic and focked up Artificial Intelligence traps you in an endless maze of rooms and testing areas in which you will have to survive and find exploits to gain freedom.

"Well done. Here come the test results: "You are a horrible person." That's what it says: a horrible person. We weren't even testing for that." -GLaDOS
